## [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)

### Methods

|                                                                  Method                                                                  |                                             Return type                                              |                                                                                                                                                                               Brief description                                                                                                                                                                               |
|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [duplicate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#duplicate())                                     | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Creates a copy of this item and appends it to the end of the form.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getGoToPage()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getGoToPage())                                 | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Gets the [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item) that the form will jump to after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).                                                                                                       |
| [getHelpText()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getHelpText())                                 | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like [ImageItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item), [PageBreakItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item), and [SectionHeaderItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)). |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getId())                                             | `Integer`                                                                                            | Gets the item's unique identifier.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [getIndex()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getIndex())                                       | `Integer`                                                                                            | Gets the index of the item among all the items in the form.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [getPageNavigationType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getPageNavigationType())             | [PageNavigationType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-navigation-type) | Gets the type of page navigation that occurs after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [getTitle()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getTitle())                                       | `String`                                                                                             | Gets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)).                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [getType()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#getType())                                         | [ItemType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-type)                      | Gets the item's type, represented as an [ItemType](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/item-type).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [setGoToPage(goToPageItem)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#setGoToPage(PageBreakItem))        | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Sets the page to jump to after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [setGoToPage(navigationType)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#setGoToPage(PageNavigationType)) | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Sets the type of page navigation that occurs after completing the page before this page break (that is, upon reaching this page break by normal linear progression through the form).                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [setHelpText(text)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#setHelpText(String))                       | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Sets the item's help text (sometimes called description text for layout items like [ImageItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/image-item), [PageBreakItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item), and [SectionHeaderItems](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)). |
| [setTitle(title)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item#setTitle(String))                            | [PageBreakItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/page-break-item)           | Sets the item's title (sometimes called header text, in the case of a [SectionHeaderItem](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/forms/section-header-item)).                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
